definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: It is said that originally the that daytime legendary figure Tai Yu on the judo history establishes.
sentences.chinese: 据说是日本柔道史上的传奇人物泰裕创建。

sentences.english: It is traditionally said to have been founded in 18 BC by the legendary leader Onjo.
sentences.chinese: 据传于公元前18年为传奇人物温祚所建。

sentences.english: Facchetti chose the Milanese Nerazzurri, and would go on to become a legend.
sentences.chinese: 法切蒂选择了蓝黑军团，最终成为一代传奇人物。

sentences.english: He was a legendary figure in Huizhou.
sentences.chinese: 他可是惠州的一位传奇人物。

sentences.english: The Silicon Valley legend will become chairman of the firm.
sentences.chinese: 这这位硅谷的传奇人物将会成为公司的主席。

sentences.english: who's just a legend, absolute god.
sentences.chinese: 他绝对是一个传奇人物。

sentences.english: This legendary man has endured almost all the bitterness of human life.
sentences.chinese: 这位传奇人物曾饱尝人世的辛酸。

sentences.english: It`s such a pleasure to play in front of such greats legends.
sentences.chinese: 能在这样一群网坛传奇人物面前打球我真是太荣幸了。

sentences.english: But it was a legend she tried to escape for fifty years.
sentences.chinese: 沉默使她成为传奇人物，五十年的遁世更是一个传奇。

sentences.english: His heroic feats made him a legend in his own time.
sentences.chinese: 他的英雄业绩使他成了他那个时代的传奇人物。

sentences.english: Peck was a legend among the brave band of freelance camera-men.
sentences.chinese: 佩克在个体摄影师勇敢的群体中是一名传奇人物。

sentences.english: You're a legend, though. I mean, you do know that.
sentences.chinese: 不过你是个传奇人物，我想这点你是知道的。

sentences.english: Baseball legend Tommy Lasorda and Joe Gera Jillar.
sentences.chinese: 棒球传奇人物拉索达和吉尔。

sentences.english: Joey Knish is a New York legend.
sentences.chinese: 克尼什是个纽约传奇人物。

sentences.english: He is Sinbad: Legend of the seven seas.
sentences.chinese: 他就是辛巴达，是横越七大洋的传奇人物。

sentences.english: Should he persevere though he can become a legend among his Garou kin.
sentences.chinese: 万一他坚持不懈，那么他将成为传奇人物。

legendary/fantasy saga/romance/short stories of the Tang and Song Dynasty

an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent

person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
